definition: edible subterranean fungus of the genus Tuber
details:
noun
- edible subterranean fungus of the genus Tuber
= synonyms: truffle
- pod of the peanut vine containing usually 2 nuts or seeds
= synonyms: peanut
- a common European plant having edible tubers with the flavor of roasted chestnuts
- any of various highly prized edible subterranean fungi of the genus Tuber
= synonyms: truffle
